materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"fd1l6","text":"25mg cis-Diammineplatinum(II) dichloride - Sigma Aldrich Product Number P4394","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"et54n","text":"0.9% NaCl solution","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fhug5","text":"Promega Human DNA - Human Mixture","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eradt","text":"Buffer","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cqrtq","text":"Gibson P20 pipette","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1m42j","text":"Wide bore tips","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"64kf1","text":"a 1.8 mL Eppendorf tube .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

warning: {"blocks":[{"key":"cnapd","text":"Cisplatin safety warnings:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"crl1a","text":"H300 Fatal if swallowed.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1hu08","text":"H315 Causes skin irritation.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"70n7p","text":"H317 May cause an allergic skin reaction.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5s4kq","text":"H319 Causes serious eye irritation.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"457h7","text":"H334 May cause allergy or asthma symptoms or breathing difficulties if inhaled.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"esfeg","text":"H335 May cause respiratory irritation.\nH350 May cause cancer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bn67e","text":"Measure out in fume cupboard or enclosed chemical preparation unit; add solvent in Biosafety cabinet","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
